description:
"I will end this rotten world! I will cause a regenesis!"
Kenshin describes the selfishness and foolishness he witnessed while wandering the world as truths to Kenshiro.
Unable to watch Kenshiro on the defensive against Kenshin any longer, Erika steels her resolve and approaches Kenshin. They disappear together in a gust of wind.
Since his pressure point was struck in his battle against Kenshin, the light of Kenshiro`s life is fading. To prepare for his final battle against Kenshin, Kenshiro has Ramon strike a pressure point that will extend his life.
Source: crunchyroll
